sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent implements OnInit { employeeForm!:FormGroup constructor(private fb:FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.createFrom() } createFrom(){ this.employeeForm = this.fb.group({ companyName:[undefined,Validators.required], employeeName:[undefined,Validators.required], idNo:[undefined,[Validators.required, Validators.pattern('^[0-9]*$')]], DOB:[undefined,Validators.required], email:[undefined,[Validators.required,Validators.email]], }) } onSubmit(){ console.log(this.employeeForm.value) } }
Company Name is Required.
Employee Name is Required.
ID NO is Required.
Data Of Birth is Required
Email is Required. Invalid Email Format.
